name: fantasic
description:
FPSGame for one person in VR

Production period : one month

Unreal Engine Version 4.27.2

Language : Japanese

Credits : 

Hikaru Goto - UI,  Enemy, Player, Effect

Haruki Ikeda - HP UI

Sion Sirai - Animation

Fuuga Takekoshi - Asset collection

Kaname Ishida - Title UI

Operation Explanation :

Right Trigger :  push the top button(when displaying UI ) and shoot

Right Grip : Grab the Gun

Left Trigger :  push the below button(when displaying UI )

A Button : Warp pointer

Left Stick : Camera Move
